about.title: A little bit about me
about.name: My name is Elias Conde Reyes and I am a Computer Systems Engineer.
about.first: I love learning programming in general, including web, progressive, and native mobile application development. I'm always learning to develop applications using cross-platform frameworks such as 'React Native' or 'Flutter'.
about.second: I have a B2 level of English proficiency in both writing and speaking. Additionally, I had the opportunity to live in Canada for a month to take a leadership course and practice my English at Royal Roads University located in Vancouver Island. I am passionate about learning and finding solutions to various problems. In my free time, I enjoy playing video games and furthering my knowledge of the programming world.
about.tools: These are some of the tools I have learned to use during my learning journey:
about.work1: During my time at Gi Moen Consultores, I had the privilege of working as a Fullstack Developer and Scrum Master, playing an integral role in project development and management. As a Fullstack Developer, I was responsible for managing databases in MongoDb and PostgreSQL, ensuring efficient storage and access to data. Additionally, I utilized my skills in ReactJS to create attractive and functional views on the frontend, while developing endpoints in Django on the backend, implementing business logic and ensuring data integrity.
about.work2: A crucial part of my role was optimizing performance in both the backend and frontend, identifying bottlenecks and applying efficient solutions to enhance the user experience. I also took on the responsibility of managing AWS services, implementing continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices using GitLab for deployment on the AWS infrastructure. Additionally, I managed domains in Google Domains, ensuring proper configuration and maintenance.
about.work3: As a Scrum Master, I facilitated the agile software development process. I conducted retrospectives using Miro, providing a space for team learning and continuous improvement. I used Jira to assign tasks and manage workflow, ensuring proper execution and project tracking.
about.work4: Furthermore, I led specific projects where I containerized the entire application using Docker, enabling easy deployment and greater portability across different environments. I also led the development of two websites:
about.work5: . These websites are currently deployed on AWS and were designed with a focus on efficiency, performance, and an attractive user experience.
about.work6: In summary, my experience at Gi Moen Consultores as a Fullstack Developer and Scrum Master allowed me to play an integral role in application development, performance optimization, cloud service management, and facilitation of agile methodologies. I take pride in contributing to project success and acquiring solid skills in the field of software development.
